rows.label: tlk00350110_msg0001
rows.name:
Assigning missions, negotiating rewards...
I'm swamped every day!

rows.label: tlk00350110_msg0002
rows.name:
I wish Boss Vandham could have seen
how lively the village has become...

rows.label: tlk00350110_msg0003
rows.name:
No, maybe he's watching from somewhere!
Hehe, I'd better work hard so he doesn't
get angry!
